title: Accounts Assistant
content:
Fender Musical Instruments Corporation is a world-famous brand with offices across the globe. Fender was born in Southern California and has built a worldwide influence beyond the studio and the stage. A Fender is more than an instrument; it’s a cultural symbol that resonates globally.
We are searching for a Accounts Assistant to join our team in our East Grinstead offices. This position will assist the Senior Finance Manager – Fender Musical Instruments Europe Limited in the day to day running within the Fender EMEA region.
Main Responsibilities

Ensure compliance with all company policies and standard operating procedures and identify/establish internal controls and ensure their operating effectiveness,
Bank account reconciliations and assisting with weekly cash flow forecasting,
Support with the preparation of monthly intercompany statements,
Support with month end reconciliations and accruals,
Support with the preparation of local EU VAT & Intrastat returns, EU Sales Lists, and duty administrative support for UK and EU regions,
Support with the preparation, and submission of local statutory accounts for UK and EU statutory accounts,
Support with the preparation of corporate income tax calculations for the UK and EU operations, where applicable,
Assist with local and Group audits,
Prepare ad hoc credit and debit memos,
Cover for other accounting teams during absence and holiday,
Provide further ad hoc support to wider Finance Managers and Financial Director where required,
Identify approved process improvements and implement them once approved.

This is an indication of the main responsibilities of the role and the Company reserves the right to amend the content of the role at its discretion.
 
Person Specification
Essential Skills/Knowledge/Experience

Practical experience of working in a finance function for a medium sized company,
Practical experience of Accounts Payable functions and liaising with vendors,
Working in a product based company,
Attention to detail,
Deadline driven with the ability to remain calm under pressure,
Proactive,
Multi-tasking, flexible and adaptable,
Excel (intermediate level) and Word experience.
Ability to work at pace.

          Desirable Skills/Knowledge/Experience

AS400,
Concur SAP,
SAP,
Fluent in another European language, desirable but not essential.
